price: 36. (Iblis) dijo: «¡Señor, concédeme un plazo de tiempo hasta el Día de la Resurrección!».
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرۡنِيٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يُبۡعَثُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi fa-anẓir'nī ilā yawmi yub'ʿathūna
